mapper.select: select count(0) from w_web where webName = #{webName}
select count(0) from w_web where webUrl = #{webUrl}
mapper.insert: insert into w_web (webUrl, webName, userId, rootType, subType, recordInfo, accessLevel, webDescription, remark, createTime, webStatus) values (#{webUrl},#{webName},#{userId},#{rootType},#{subType},#{recordInfo}, #{accessLevel},#{webDescription},#{remark},now(),1)
mapper.select: select u.parentId from w_web w,u_user u where w.webId = #{webId} and w.userId = u.userId
mapper.update: update w_web set webStatus = #{webStatus} where webId = #{webId}
mapper.insert: insert into w_adspace (webId, upstreamId, upstreamType, terminal, spaceType, createTime, spaceName, width, height, remark, status) values (#{webId},#{upstreamId},#{upstreamType},#{terminal},#{spaceType},now(),#{spaceName},#{width},#{height},#{remark},#{status})
insert into w_adspace_upstream (spaceId, upstreamId, startTime) values (#{spaceId},#{upstreamId},#{startTime})
mapper.select: select u.* from w_adspace a,w_adspace_upstream u where a.spaceId = #{spaceId} and a.spaceId = u.spaceId and a.upstreamId = u.upstreamId ORDER BY u.startTime desc limit 0,1
select u.parentId from w_adspace d,w_web w,u_user u where d.spaceId = #{spaceId} and d.webId = w.webId and w.userId = u.userId

insert into w_statistics (spaceId, createTime, beforeLookPV, beforeClickNum, beforeIncome, lookPV, clickNum, clickProbability, income, ecmp, status) values
(#{item.spaceId},#{item.createTime},#{item.beforeLookPV},#{item.beforeClickNum},#{item.beforeIncome},#{item.lookPV},#{item.clickNum},#{item.clickProbability},#{item.income},#{item.ecmp},0)

mapper.select: select a.`status` from w_statistics s,w_adspace a where s.statisticsId = #{statisticsId} and s.spaceId = a.spaceId
select *,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,"%Y-%m-%d") as time from w_upstream_type order by createTime asc limit #{num},#{pageSize}
select count(0) from w_upstream_type limit #{num},#{pageSize}

select s.statisticsId,d.spaceId,t.upstreamDivided,d.dividedY,d.dividedZ,s.beforeLookPV,s.beforeClickNum,s.beforeIncome, s.lookPV,s.clickNum,s.income,s.clickProbability,s.ecmp from w_statistics s,w_adspace d,w_upstream_type t where s.statisticsId = #{statisticsId} and s.spaceId = d.spaceId and d.upstreamType = t.upstreamType
select * from w_message where TO_DAYS(createTime) >= TO_DAYS(now())
select count(0) from w_message_read where userId = #{userId} and TO_DAYS(createTime) >= TO_DAYS(now())
select t.upstreamDivided as dividedX,a.dividedY,a.dividedZ from a_upstream u,a_adspace a,a_upstream_type t where u.upstreamId = #{upstreamId} and u.spaceId = a.spaceId and u.upstreamType = t.type
